frontmatter.title: FluxBuilder
frontmatter.meta_title: FluxBuilder - A greatest tool for Flutter apps as Fluxstore Pro, Fluxstore Woocommerce, Fluxstore Listing, Fluxstore Multi Vendor, FluxNews, Fluxstore Shopify
frontmatter.meta_description: FluxBuilder is a drag-and-drop tool which guides non-tech users in building their own mobile apps in just 3 simple steps: Integrate, Design and Publish

markdownRemark.html:
1. Introduction

FluxBuilder is a new approach for non-tech users in designing the app when installing Flutter mobile apps. It is a drag-and-drop tool that guides non-tech users to customize the design of their own mobile apps in just 3 simple steps: Integrate, Design and Publish.

This FluxBuilder also helps users to view the demo app of their website, in addition to designing the Flutter mobile app easily and intuitively. Beside that, it can help to customize the design of Flutter mobile app without re-submitting to app stores, please refer to this blog for more detail. Instead of spending thousands of dollars in hiring a mobile developer team and months in waiting, users now could be able to design their own mobile app in just a few steps by, as mentioned above, drag and draw actions. Moreover, users will get enthusiastic and excellent from InspireUI technical team when encountering any issues. Design a mobile app for business has never been easier nowadays, hasn't it?

What exactly is Flutter? Flutter is a free and open-source mobile UI framework created by Google and released in May 2017. In a few words, it allows you to create a native mobile application with only one codebase and run both Android and iOS. In fact, Flutter has always been updated so often that programmers would probably lose track if they do not keep themselves up-to-date. Knowing that there is a rapidly increasing demand in creating Flutter apps from business owners who have difficulty with Flutter programming experience, InspireUI has come up with a solution - FluxBuilder.

2. Reference links

Official website https://fluxbuilder.com/
Company website https://inspireui.com
Compatible devices Mac, Ipad, iPhone, Window, Android (we recommend to use on Mac and Ipad for more stable)
Compatible website wordpress, woocommerce, magento 2.x, opencart 3.x, woocommerce with dokan or wcfm, Listeo, shopify
Compatible Flutter apps FluxNews, Fluxstore Pro, Fluxstore Woocommerce, Fluxstore Multi vendor, Fluxstore Listing, FluxStore Shopify
Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/inspireui
Medium blog https://medium.com/@inspireui
Support Github https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/issues

3. Next step

Go to next Installation page to download and use the FluxBuilder tool.

You also can refer the Common Questions page for some faq.

If the product is useful, please support the team by giving us 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è Rating on Appstore or Google Play or Download Page.

Thank you & happy coding üòä
